\hypertarget{namespaceaurora}{}\doxysection{aurora Namespace Reference}
\label{namespaceaurora}\index{aurora@{aurora}}
\doxysubsection*{Classes}
\begin{DoxyCompactItemize}
\item 
struct \mbox{\hyperlink{structaurora_1_1_calibration_data}{Calibration\+Data}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em Calibration data container for Aurora This data is calibrated from the Qu-\/\+Bit default Aurora firmware. It is advised not to save over this data unless you are prepared to recalibrate. \end{DoxyCompactList}\item 
class \mbox{\hyperlink{classaurora_1_1_hardware}{Hardware}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em \mbox{\hyperlink{classaurora_1_1_hardware}{Hardware}} support class for the Qu-\/\+Bit Aurora This should be created, and intitialized at the beginning of any program before running anything else. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}

\doxysubsection*{Variables}
\begin{DoxyCompactItemize}
\item 
daisy\+::\+USBHost\+Handle \mbox{\hyperlink{namespaceaurora_add63f29f2efd87c1754e7add264350e8}{usb}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em global USB host handle accessor This is left global so that it is guaranteed to be within the AXI SRAM with the aurora\+\_\+sram.\+lds linker file. \end{DoxyCompactList}\item 
daisy\+::\+Fat\+FSInterface \mbox{\hyperlink{namespaceaurora_a300b1377a387f60ff447c08d7a747877}{fatfs\+\_\+interface}}
\begin{DoxyCompactList}\small\item\em global accessor to the Fat\+FS interface. This is left global so that it is guaranteed to be within the AXI SRAM with the aurora\+\_\+sram.\+lds linker file. \end{DoxyCompactList}\end{DoxyCompactItemize}

\doxysubsection{Variable Documentation}
\mbox{\Hypertarget{namespaceaurora_a300b1377a387f60ff447c08d7a747877}\label{namespaceaurora_a300b1377a387f60ff447c08d7a747877}} 
\index{aurora@{aurora}!fatfs\_interface@{fatfs\_interface}}
\index{fatfs\_interface@{fatfs\_interface}!aurora@{aurora}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{fatfs\_interface}{fatfs\_interface}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily daisy\+::\+Fat\+FSInterface aurora\+::fatfs\+\_\+interface}



global accessor to the Fat\+FS interface. This is left global so that it is guaranteed to be within the AXI SRAM with the aurora\+\_\+sram.\+lds linker file. 

\mbox{\Hypertarget{namespaceaurora_add63f29f2efd87c1754e7add264350e8}\label{namespaceaurora_add63f29f2efd87c1754e7add264350e8}} 
\index{aurora@{aurora}!usb@{usb}}
\index{usb@{usb}!aurora@{aurora}}
\doxysubsubsection{\texorpdfstring{usb}{usb}}
{\footnotesize\ttfamily daisy\+::\+USBHost\+Handle aurora\+::usb}



global USB host handle accessor This is left global so that it is guaranteed to be within the AXI SRAM with the aurora\+\_\+sram.\+lds linker file.
